metadata.Title: CVE-2013-2024 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
OS command injection vulnerability in the "qs" procedure from the "utils" module in Chicken before 4.9.0.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2024` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

chicken-bin - 4.8.0.3-1
libchicken6 - 4.8.0.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chicken package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.8.0.3-1').
